DOC.detailed_description: The aim study evaluate efficacy thoracic epidural vs. continuous extra-pleural intercostal local anesthesia treatment post thoracotomy pain adult patient . Study patient randomize thoracic epidural continuous extrapleural catheter group [ Figure 1 ] . Because thoracic epidural anesthesia gold standard continuous extrapleural intercostal local anesthesia potentially easy less prone complication , study structure `` equivalence study '' . The null hypothesis ( Ho ) continuous intercostal nerve blockade bad epidural post-thoracotomy pain management . Therefore , alternative hypothesis ( Ha ) continuous intercostal nerve blockade equal well epidural post-thoracotomy pain management .
